title: What is the most viewed K-pop fancam, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: #1—BTS Jimin, Fake Love fancam, 82M views  #2—BTS V, Boy With Luv fancam, 66M views  #3—BTS Jungkook, Boy With Luv fancam, 53M views  According to someone in the industry, the Top 5 fancam watched by rookies, trainees, and even other idols when it comes to dancing, moves and body control are— JiminKaiTaeminTenJungkookGirls— SeulgiLisaMomoSoojinSinBiMale idols for stage presence, expressions and emotions— TaehyungTaeyongBaekhyunG-DragonRain(Not including the above YT videos) Edit: Hani from EXID has one at 30M. Lisa’s Swalla has about an average of 8M views. Her most is 10M views. Taehyung has 2 at 10M views. Jungkook has an average of 2M views for his fancams, and has one at 30M+ views. Jimin has a few at 3M, and one at 7M. Sana’s most is 9.3M views. Rose’s most is 8.6M views. Nayeon’s most is 6.2M views. Jennie’s most is 5.7M views. Jihyo‘s most is 5.5M views. Tzuyu’s most is 4.8M views. Jisoo’s most is 4.7M views. G Dragon’s most is 4.2M views. Kai’s most is 3.9M views. Momo’s most is 2.1M views. Rookies: Yuna’s most is 3.2M views. She has 3 others over 1M views. Yeji has 1 at 1M, and 1 at 2M. Wonyoung’s most is 1.8M views. Soobin has 1 at 1M, which is good for a rookie. Chaeryoung has 1 at 1.4M views. Ryujin has 1 at 1.3M views. Chaeyeon’s most is 1.2M views. She has 2 others over 1M views. Lia has 1 at 1.1M views. There’s a lot more, but it’s hard to find.

TOP 10 MOST VIEWED AND VIRAL FANCAMS 1.TAEHYUNG (BTS) - BWL(124mln views)Taehyung has a baby face, but his voice can make a baby 👶😏💜💜💜  2.JIMIN(BTS) - FAKE LOVE(103mln views)He is indeed one of the best dancer in SOUTH KOREA 💜💜💜  3.JUNGKOOK (BTS) - BWL(56 mln views)He literally spaced out 2:57😄💜💜💜  4. JUNGKOOK (BTS) - FAKE LOVE(32mln views)HE LOOKS LIKE A PRINCE 👼💜💜💜  5. HANI (EXID) - UP-DOWN(32 mln views)You might not know, but her simple fancam saved the group. Exis said they were having such a hard time before this fancam happened. 💖💖💖  6.LISA (BLACKPINK) - SDC(26 mln views) One of the hottest fancam💛💛💛  7. BAE SUZY (MISS A) - LOVE SONG(22 mln views)Her fancam has more views then actual song 💗💗💗  8. TAEHYUNG (BTS) - ON(20 mln views)King of fancam 2020 💜💜💜  9. TAEHYUNG (BTS) - MIC DROP(16 mln views)His blonde hair and mullet went viral 💥💜💜💜  10. SUNMI (SOLOIST) - GASHINA(15 mln views)You will love her backup dancers too 👀💙💙💙  .   STAY HEALTHY!
